content.text: 1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened" )
( ing-3 "2 tablespoons heat-stable granular sugar substitute" )

content.text: 1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided" )

content.text: 1 (1.4 ounce) package instant  sugar-free chocolate pudding mix
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (1.4 ounce) package instant  sugar-free chocolate pudding mix" )

content.text: 0) In a bowl, cut margarine into flour until crumbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cut"@14:17 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "margarine"@18:27 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
		:gol ( ing-1 "flour"@33:38 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until crumbly"@39:52 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Press into an 11-in baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray.
2) Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "15-18 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until lightly browned"@46:67 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and sweetener until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "beat"@21:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cream cheese"@26:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "sweetener"@43:52 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until smooth"@53:65 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Fold in half of the whipped topping.
7) In a mixing bowl, combine milk and pudding mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@29:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pudding mix"@38:49 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Beat on low speed for 2 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:mnr ( "low speed"@11:20 / OTHER )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "2 minutes"@25:34 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Top with the remaining whipped topping.
